article.description: Andre Brown scored 21 points and Delonte Holland added 19 to lead top-seeded DePaul over TCU 89-65 in the quarterfinals of the Conference USA tournament Thursday.
article.headline: No. 1 seed gets UAB in semis
article.story: CINCINNATI (AP) -- Andre Brown scored 21 points and Delonte Holland added 19 to lead top-seeded DePaul over TCU 89-65 in the quarterfinals of the Conference USA tournament Thursday. The Blue Demons will play Alabama-Birmingham in Friday's semifinals. Both teams were among five that shared the regular-season championship. DePaul (20-8) has won 10 of its past 11 games, reaching 20 wins for the first time since the 1999-2000 season. TCU (12-17) ended its season by losing three of four. Drake Diener scored 13 points in the second half to finish with 15 for DePaul. Quemont Greer added 12. Nucleus Smith led TCU with 17 points. Corey Santee added 16 and Marcus Shropshire 14. Brown scored 13 points in the first half, when the Blue Demons twice led by as many as 20. It was 42-29 at halftime, and TCU could get no closer than eight points in the second half.
